title: Calories in Oreo McFlurry
meta_description: Learn calories in Oreo McFlurry with full nutrition facts, macros like carbs and fat, plus tweaks and FAQs for McDonald's treat.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's regular size Oreo McFlurry (about 340g), vanilla soft serve with Oreo cookie pieces, no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, and recipe changes; check McDonald's app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A regular Oreo McFlurry packs ~510 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Choose small size instead of regular

faqs.q: How many calories in a regular Oreo McFlurry?
faqs.a: Approximately 510 kcal for one regular serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Oreo McFlurry?
faqs.a: About 73g total carbs, including 55g sugars and 1g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Oreo McFlurry high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 20g total fat with 12g saturated per serving.

faqs.q: Calories in small vs. large Oreo McFlurry?
faqs.a: Small: ~360 kcal; large: ~680 kcal; varies by location.
Around 8g protein from the soft serve base.
